name: Dirtbox Rally
description:
A very, very early prototype.

The premise of the game is to complete tasks using your vehicle. 

You will need to equip your vehicle correctly to complete the objective. However, you'll need to take into account things such as the environment, objective type, fuel, navigation and more!

Contains one vehicle (hatchback) and a very, very flat desert map.

Things such as modifications, etc. have been removed.

Builds will begin to get more frequent!

More to come!
